TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CustomContentState extends System.Object

summary.span: 使用 ，可以在源内容片段的不同状态之间导航，而无需为每个后续导航重新加载源内容。

span.span: enables the ability to navigate through different states of a single piece of source content without reloading the source content for each subsequent navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下 , 不会在导航历史记录中存储内容对象的实例。By default, does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反, 每次使用导航历史记录导航到内容对象时, 都将创建该对象的新实例。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行为旨在避免在将大量内容导航到时消耗过多的内存。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此, 不会从一个导航到下一个导航来记住内容的状态。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 但是, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]可以将一段自定义状态与内容的导航历史记录项关联起来。However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] provides the ability to associate a piece of custom state with the navigation history entry for a piece of content. 与导航历史记录项关联的自定义状态必须是从派生的类。Custom state that is associated with a navigation history entry must be a class that derives from . 您可以使用以下方法之一将对象与导航历史记录项关联:You associate a object with a navigation history entry by using one of the following techniques: - 调用**AddBackEntry**:Calling **AddBackEntry**: - - - 。. - 当引发以下事件之一时进行设置:Setting when one of the following events are raised: - - - - - 通过在要与其关联的自定义状态的类上实现。By implementing on the class that wants custom state to be associated with it. > [!NOTE] > 如果调用**AddBackEntry**方法, 则必须处理**导航**事件或实现。If you call the **AddBackEntry** method, you must handle the **Navigating** event or implement . 导航到导航历史记录项时, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]将检查是否有自定义对象与其关联。When the navigation history entry is navigated to, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] checks to see if a custom object is associated with it. 如果是这样, 它将调用以允许自定义对象应用它从上一导航中记住的状态。If so, it calls to allow the custom object to apply the state it remembered from the previous navigation. 自定义类可以重写, 以更改为对象关联的导航历史记录项显示的名称。A custom class can override to change the name that appears for the navigation history entry to which the object is associated. 从不同导航器 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]、 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 、 )的导航中可看到返回的值。The value that returns is visible from the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the various navigators ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], , ). 派生自的类必须是可序列化的, 这意味着它必须至少使用进行扩展, 并且可以选择实现。A class that derives from must be serializable, which means it must at least be augmented with , and optionally implement . > [!IMPORTANT] > 当你在自定义内容状态中存储信息时, 如果不希望将内容保留在内存中, 则不能存储对要记住其状态的页的实例的任何引用。When you store information in custom content state, you cannot store any references to the instance of the page for which you are remembering state if don't want the content to be retained in memory. 这会[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]阻止释放页面实例, 并破坏默认导航历史记录行为的目的。This prevents [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] from releasing the page instance, and defeats the purpose of the default navigation history behavior. 如果必须这样做, 请考虑改用。If you must do this, consider using instead. ## Examples 下面是重写 的实现的示例。The following is an example of a implementation that overrides . [!code-csharp[CustomContentStateSnippets#MyCustomContentStateCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomContentStateSnippets/CSharp/MyCustomContentState.cs#mycustomcontentstatecode)] [!code-vb[CustomContentStateSnippets#MyCustomContentStateCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomContentStateSnippets/visualbasic/mycustomcontentstate.vb#mycustomcontentstatecode)]

summary.span: 存储在导航历史记录中的内容的名称。

span.span: The name for the content that is stored in navigation history.

summary.span: 的值显示自 、 和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] 导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

span.span: The value of is displayed from , , and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].

value.span: 存储在导航历史记录中的内容的 名称。

span.span: The name of the content that is stored in navigation history.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储在后退和前进导航历史记录中的条目通常可以通过宿主导航器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]导航上的 "后退" 和 "前进" 下拉导航按钮, 包括[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] 、 或。Entries stored in back and forward navigation history are typically available from the back and forward drop down navigation buttons on the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the host navigator, including , , or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]. 显示在 "导航历史记录" 下拉列表中的值。 is the value that is displayed in a navigation history drop down list. 不需要重写;如果不是, 则使用以下数据片段, 按优先级顺序自动构造导航历史记录项名称: does not have to be overridden; if not, the following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 。. - 当前页[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的和 and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 当前页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page.

param.name: navigationService
param.span: 一种 ，为对要将此 应用到其中的内容负责的导航器所拥有。

span.span: The owned by the navigator responsible for the content to which this is being applied.

param.name: mode
param.span: 一种 ，指定如何导航到要对其应用 的内容。

span.span: A that specifies how the content to which the is being applied was navigated to.

summary.span: 在发生导航时调用，以对内容片段重新应用状态。

span.span: Called to reapply state to a piece of content when navigation occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导航历史记录中具有关联对象的项导航到时, 将调用。 is called when an item in navigation history that has an associated object is navigated to. 从抽象类派生时, 必须重写, 不过重写实现仅需调用基方法。When deriving from the abstract class, must be overridden, although the override implementation need only call the base method.
